labels.name: status:waiting
labels.description: Task is waiting to be started

issues.title: [Feature] Login Implementation
issues.body:
## Description
Implement user login and registration functionality.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create login form
- [ ] Add JWT token handling
- [ ] Implement session management

issues.title: [Feature] Dashboard Enhancement
issues.body:
## Bug Description
When JWT token expires, the app crashes instead of redirecting to login.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Login to the app
2. Wait for token to expire
3. Try to access protected route

## Expected Behavior
Should redirect to login page.

issues.title: [Bug] Token Expiration Handling
issues.body:
## Description
Create a dashboard page showing key metrics and charts.

## Requirements
- User activity chart
- Task completion stats
- Team performance widget

issues.title: fix: Handle token expiration properly
issues.body:
## Summary
Fix token expiration handling bug.

issues.title: [Bug] Search results not updating
issues.body:
## Bug
Search results don't refresh after filtering.

## Steps
1. Search for item
2. Apply filter
3. Results stay the same

issues.title: [Feature] Export to PDF
